title: State and Federal Marijuana Laws
description: Witnesses testified about conflicts between state and federal law regarding the use, sale and distribution of marijuana, particularly for medicinal purposes. Deputy Attorney General James Cole says the Justice Department and federal bank regulators will enable financial institutions to transact business with legitimate marijuana industry without fear of prosecution. officials also indicated they would not challenge Colorado and Washington marijuana laws as long as they implement effective enforcement systems.
